map.forest.name: Whispering Pines
map.forest.description: A dense and mysterious woodland that echoes with the rustling whispers of ancient pine trees and the distant calls of unseen creatures.
map.forest.rooms.entrance.name: Forest's Edge
map.forest.rooms.entrance.description: Tall pines mark the boundary of the forest, casting long shadows over the undergrowth. A beaten path leads deeper into the woods.
map.forest.rooms.deeper.name: Deeper Woods
map.forest.rooms.deeper.description: The canopy thickens here, allowing only fragments of sunlight to touch the mossy floor. The air is cool and filled with the scent of pine.
map.forest.rooms.clearing.name: Mystic Clearing
map.forest.rooms.clearing.description: A hidden clearing surrounded by ancient trees, rumored to be a place of druidic rituals. The earth here vibrates with a faint magic.
